title: The Thanksgiving Episode
itunes:title: The Thanksgiving Episode
description:
Note-The 1st 4 minutes of the show was clipped. It was just the usual intro, so don't panic. On this episode we talk about lost loved one's from holidays past, the number of police who have been getting busted beating civilians, The justice system, and James answers if he had beef with 2pac for the last and final time. Make sure to go order that TGC T-Shirts for the holidays. Enter the code HOLIDAY20 for our Black Friday special Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
